issue.title: mangaapi.manhuaren.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [http://mangaapi.manhuaren.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fmangaapi.manhuaren.com) ### Comment > 每次看漫畫進入第一頁的時候，中間就會跳出“移動網路會消耗你的流量”的訊息來，很惱人 ### Screenshots

comment.body:
> Is this an app or a website? Please send more information and also steps for reproduction.

我不確定要說中文還是機翻成英文，所以請讓我先用中文
目前我已試過的規則如下：
||mangaapi.manhuaren.com^$script
||mangaapi.manhuaren.com^$object
mangaapi.manhuaren.com##script
mangaapi.manhuaren.com##object
但是並沒有作用，而其他的如：
||mangaapi.manhuaren.com^$third-party
||mangaapi.manhuaren.com^$other
||mangaapi.manhuaren.com^$～object
則是不能連上網頁？，上面圖1的部分會出現錯誤

關於app的補充，與#21078是相同的
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/21078#issuecomment-412828928

但是可以阻擋廣告，卻不能阻擋上面圖2的內容

issue.title: mail.yahoo.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [NSFW] [https://mail.yahoo.com/d/folders/1?guccounter=1](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmail.yahoo.com%2Fd%2Ffolders%2F1%3Fguccounter%3D1) ### Comment > When AGBE is OFF while all other extensions are on, I can access the site. But if it's ON, something blocks the site with page stating: "The page isn’t redirecting properly. Firefox has detected that the server is redirecting the request for this address in a way that will never complete. This problem can sometimes be caused by disabling or refusing to accept cookies." ### [NSFW] Screenshots

comment.body:
> I still get ads unless I block them via `||quora.com^*ExpandAdLoader`.

You need "Advanced Protection" from the paid version for it to work fully on Quora, and it works.
